TopicTitle: Kerbals EVA jetpacks disappearing after launch

Articles.Content:
So whilst in the VAB, Kerbals have their personal chute and an EVA jetpack in their inventories, after launch, their jetpack disappears from their inventory leaving only their parachute. Anybody else come across this issue?

edit: just checked and they actually disappear as soon as the vessel is placed on the launch pad.

Edited May 24, 2021 by si2504
